entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Falls 2:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
